content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s big good wool 1 100% andean highland wool undyed each skein is 274 yards approximately 548 yards required we used the color winter grass - us 8 5 mm circular or straight needles 3 gauge 13 stitches and 14¾ row = 4 inches in fisherman s rib size finished dimensions 9½ inches wide x 72 inches long designed for purl soho by laura ferguson 1 https //www purlsoho com/big-good-wool 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802
